txt.en: Investigate the rumours about the structural integrity of Járnfast.
You should talk to Spall about the foundations of Járnfast.
Investigate the rumours about the structural integrity of Járnfast.
You should examine cracks in the stonework of Járnfast, both inside and out.

'Járnfast! This much we can say without any inspection: it has not been shaken to the ground. To be proper record-keepers, however, we must get closer and inspect any cracks in the stone from without and from within.'
DNT check for cracks around Járnfast ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Now that you have inspected a great number of the cracks apparent in Járnfast's stonework, you should talk to Spall.

'Many of the flaws in Járnfast's stone are older than you or I, [placeholder], though a few are clearly new. Stone-masonry is among the lore I have studied in my days, and I can state with good authority that there is no fear of Járnfast tumbling today, or in a hundred years, barring some fresh calamity.'
Investigate the rumours about the structural integrity of Járnfast.
Into the Ironfold: Foundations of Járnfast
